de.esoco.process.param

Class ParameterWrapper<T,P extends ParameterWrapper<T,P>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
      • de.esoco.process.param.ParameterWrapper<T,P>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.obrel.core.Relatable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ParameterBase, UiComponent

    public class ParameterWrapper<T,P extends ParameterWrapper<T,P>>
extends org.obrel.core.RelatedObject
    A common base class for objects that wrap the data that describes an interactive process parameter (fragment and relation type).

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParameterWrapper

        public ParameterWrapper(InteractionFragment rFragment,
                        org.obrel.core.RelationType<T> rParamType)
        Creates a new instance for a certain fragment and parameter relation type.

        If a subclass cannot provide the fragment or the relation type at creation time it may use NULL when invoking the super constructor. These values must then be set as soon as possible by invoking the respective setter method(s) (see setFragment(InteractionFragment) and setParameterType(RelationType)). This must happen before any other method on this instance is called or else a null pointer exception will occur. Typically this should only be used in the constructor of a subclass, e.g. to include some kind of self-reference (which is not possible while invoking the super constructor).

        Parameters:
        rFragment - The fragment to wrap the parameter for
        rParamType - The parameter relation type to wrap

    • Method Detail

      • initiateDownload

        public static void initiateDownload(ParameterWrapper<?,?> rParam,
                                    java.lang.String sFileName,
                                    FileType eFileType,
                                    de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<FileType,?> fDownloadGenerator)
        Initiates a download for a parameter. This method must be invoked during the handling of an event and the download will then be executed as the result of the event. After being processed by the process interaction the generated download URL will be removed from the process parameter.

        This method is protected because it's functionality should only be exposed by the API of certain parameter wrappers (e.g. buttons).

        Parameters:
        rParam - The parameter to initiate the download for
        sFileName - The file name of the download
        eFileType - The file type of the download
        fDownloadGenerator - The function that generates the download data
        Throws:
        RuntimeProcessException - If the download preparation fails

      • setFragment

        protected final void setFragment(InteractionFragment rFragment)
        Allows subclasses to set the fragment of this parameter. This should only be used if subclasses are not able to provide the fragment at construction time. In that case this method must be invoked before any other method is invoked or else an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        rFragment - The new fragment

      • setParameterEventHandler

        protected P setParameterEventHandler(de.esoco.lib.property.InteractionEventType eEventType,
                                     ValueEventHandler<T> rEventHandler)
        Helper method to set a parameter event handler that forwards interaction events to a runnable object.
        Parameters:
        eEventType - The event type to set the event handler for
        rEventHandler - rRunnable The runnable to be invoked on interaction events
        Returns:
        This instance for concatenation

      • setParameterType

        protected final void setParameterType(org.obrel.core.RelationType<T> rParamType)
        Allows subclasses to set the parameter relation type. This should only be used if subclasses are not able to provide the parameter type at construction time. In that case this method must be invoked before any other method is invoked or else an exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        rParamType - The new parameter relation type
